question: Which state / UT government is organizing the theater festival "Mohan Rakesh Natya evam Samman Samaroh"?
explanation: To pay tribute to legendary playwright Mohan Rakesh, the 4-day festival titled \"Mohan Rakesh Natya evam Samman Samaroh\" is being organized by the Delhi government\'s art and culture wing “Sahitya Kala Parishad” held at the Kamani Auditorium from November 11, 2019. The purpose of the event is to provide a platform to the upcoming talents in the field of theatre. Rakesh was widely-known as one of the brains behind the \'Nai Kahani\' (New Short Story) literary movement of Hindi literature in the 1950s & also wrote the first modern Hindi play titled \"Ashadh Ka Ek Din\" in 1958.
